name: Officeware Inc.
description:
Apply real-world concepts to keep the office secure and quickly rise the ranks at Officeware Inc! Update computers, eliminate malicious programs, and take care of scam emails to advance and rake in the cash!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

e - Interact

tab - Open handbook (works in emails as well!)

Click/space/enter/tab/e - Skip dialogue

Credits

Tim Stewart - Programming

Jun Min Kim - Programming

Aidan Carr - Music

Sriram Magesh - Art

Note: There is a rare bug that causes the game to stop progressing. If you encounter this, please let us know!
